title: Trade Search Ranking Configuration
description: Configure how trade search results are ranked by relevance. Adjust weights and priorities to match your operational needs.

weights.description: Weights control how much each factor contributes to the final relevance score. Total should equal 1.0. Exception handling is managed via dedicated Exceptions page.

status_priority.description: Priority scores for different trade statuses (0-100 scale). Higher = more urgent

asset_type_priority.description: Risk priority scores for asset types (0-100 scale). Higher = higher risk/complexity

recency_config.description: Controls time decay for recency scoring
recency_config.comment: Trades older than max_age_days get 0 recency score. Half_life_days controls decay rate.

transaction_config.comment: Trades with more transaction steps may be more complex and warrant attention

performance.comment: fetch_limit can exceed MAX_SEARCH_RESULTS to ensure best matches after ranking

metadata.notes: Trade-focused ranking. Exception management handled via dedicated Exceptions page.
